languages.text: {n}Пристально осмотрев старика, техножрец изрекает:{/n} "Токсин нервно-паралитического действия. Неизбежное прекращение жизненных функций ожидается не позднее чем через шестьдесят секунд". {n}Тихие щелчки, издаваемые визором, указывают на идущую пикт-запись.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Пристально осмотрев старика, техножрец изрекает:{/n} "Токсин нервно-паралитического действия. Неизбежное прекращение жизненных функций ожидается не позднее чем через шестидесят секунд". {n}Тихие щелчки, издаваемые визором, указывают на идущую пикт-запись.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Looking closely at the old man, the Tech-Priest utters,{/n} "Nerve toxin. The inevitable cessation of vital functions is expected in no more than sixty seconds." {n}Silent clicks emitted by the visor indicate an ongoing pict-recording.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пристально осмотрев старика, техножрец изрекает:{/n} "Токсин нервно-паралитического действия. Неизбежное прекращение жизненных функций ожидается не позднее чем через шестьдесят секунд". {n}Тихие щелчки, издаваемые визором, указывают на идущую пикт-запись.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Looking closely at the old man, the Tech-Priest utters:{/n} "Nerve toxin. The inevitable cessation of vital functions is expected no later than in sixty seconds." {n}Silent clicks emitted by the visor indicate an ongoing pict-recording.{/n}

{n}Looking closely at the old man, the Tech-Priest utters:{/n} "Nerve toxin. The inevitable cessation of vital functions is expected no later than in sixty seconds." {n}Silent clicks emitted by the visor indicate an ongoing pict-recording.{/n}

{n}Looking closely at the old man, the Tech-Priest utters,{/n} "Nerve toxin. The inevitable cessation of vital functions is expected in no less than sixty seconds." {n}Silent clicks emitted by the visor indicate an ongoing pict-recording.{/n}

{n}Looking closely at the old man, the Tech-Priest utters,{/n} "Nerve toxin. The inevitable cessation of vital functions is expected in no less than sixty seconds." {n}Silent clicks emitted by the visor indicate an ongoing pict-recording.{/n}

{n}Looking closely at the old man, the Tech-Priest utters,{/n} "Nerve toxin. The inevitable cessation of vital functions is expected in no more than sixty seconds." {n}Silent clicks emitted by the visor indicate an ongoing pict-recording.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この初老の男性を入念に眺めると、技術司祭は口を開く。{/n}「神経毒か。生体機能の停止は免れなく、それまで60秒もなさそうだ」{n}バイザーからカチカチと微弱な音がするということは、映像記録を撮っているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Looking closely at the old man, the Tech-Priest utters,{/n} "Nerve toxin. The inevitable cessation of vital functions is expected in no more than sixty seconds." {n}Silent clicks emitted by the visor indicate an ongoing pict-recording.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この初老の男性を入念に眺めると、技術司祭は口を開く。{/n}「神経毒か。生体機能の停止は免れなく、それまで60秒もなさそうだ」{n}バイザーからカチカチと微弱な音がするということは、映像記録を撮っているのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}技术神甫仔细端详着老人，开了口。{/n}“是神经毒素，预计生命机能将于六十秒内停止。”{n}帕斯卡的面甲下发出了安静的咔嗒声，他正在进行视讯记录。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Looking closely at the old man, the Tech-Priest utters,{/n} "Nerve toxin. The inevitable cessation of vital functions is expected in no more than sixty seconds." {n}Silent clicks emitted by the visor indicate an ongoing pict-recording.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}技术祭司仔细端详着老人，开了口。{/n}“是神经毒素，预计生命机能将于六十秒内必然停止。”{n}帕斯卡的面甲下发出了安静的咔嗒声，他正在进行视讯记录。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al examinar con detenimiento al anciano, el tecnosacerdote murmura:{/n} «Toxina nerviosa. Se estima el cese inevitable de sus funciones vitales en un máximo de sesenta segundos». {n}Unos chasquidos quedos provenientes de su visor indican que ha activado el grabaimágenes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Looking closely at the old man, the Tech-Priest utters,{/n} "Nerve toxin. The inevitable cessation of vital functions is expected in no more than sixty seconds." {n}Silent clicks emitted by the visor indicate an ongoing pict-recording.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al examinar con detenimiento al anciano, el tecnosacerdote murmura:{/n} «Toxina nerviosa. Se estima el cese inevitable de sus funciones vitales en no menos de sesenta segundos». {n}Unos chasquidos quedos provenientes de su visor indican que ha activado el grabaimágenes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester mustert den alten Mann aufmerksam und meint dann:{/n} "Nervengift. Der unvermeidliche Zusammenbruch der Vitalfunktionen dürfte in kaum mehr als sechzig Sekunden erfolgen." {n}Leise Klicks durch den Visor weisen auf eine laufende Vid-Aufzeichnung hin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Looking closely at the old man, the Tech-Priest utters,{/n} "Nerve toxin. The inevitable cessation of vital functions is expected in no more than sixty seconds." {n}Silent clicks emitted by the visor indicate an ongoing pict-recording.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester mustert den alten Mann aufmerksam und meint dann:{/n} "Nervengift. Der unvermeidliche Zusammenbruch der Vitalfunktionen dürfte in ungefähr sechzig Sekunden erfolgen." {n}Leise Klicks durch den Visor weisen auf eine laufende Vid-Aufzeichnung hin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre observe le vieil homme et déclare :{/n} « Agent neurotoxique. Arrêt des fonctions vitales dans moins de soixante secondes. » {n}Les cliquetis étouffés émis par sa visière indiquent qu'il a lancé une pictocapture.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Looking closely at the old man, the Tech-Priest utters,{/n} "Nerve toxin. The inevitable cessation of vital functions is expected in no more than sixty seconds." {n}Silent clicks emitted by the visor indicate an ongoing pict-recording.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprêtre observe le vieil homme et déclare :{/n} « Agent neurotoxique. Arrêt des fonctions vitales dans approximativement soixante secondes. » {n}Les cliquetis étouffés émis par sa visière indiquent qu'il a lancé une pictocapture.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar adama yakından bakan Tekno Rahip, açıklamada bulunuyor.{/n} "Sinir zehri. Hayati faaliyetlerin kaçınılmaz şekilde sonlanmasına altmış saniyeden daha az süre kalmış durumda." {n}Vizöründen çıkan hafif kliklemeler, devam etmekte olan bir foto kaydını işaret ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Looking closely at the old man, the Tech-Priest utters,{/n} "Nerve toxin. The inevitable cessation of vital functions is expected in no more than sixty seconds." {n}Silent clicks emitted by the visor indicate an ongoing pict-recording.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İhtiyar adama yakından bakan Tekno Rahip, açıklamada bulunuyor:{/n} "Sinir zehri. Hayati faaliyetlerin kaçınılmaz şekilde sonlanmasına altmış saniyeden daha az süre kalmış durumda." {n}Vizöründen çıkan hafif kliklemeler, devam etmekte olan bir foto kaydına işaret ediyor.{/n}
